performing and low performing and medium performing DevOps teams and what they
found is that high performing teams deploy 46 times more frequently than
low-performing teams that the lead time for changes that is the time from when
some code is complete to when it's running in production is two and a half thousand times faster so they're moving
much much faster this is the innovation side of it but and this is counterintuitive especially to a lot of
large organizations while they're doing that the changes that they're making are more trustworthy and fail less so
